settings.heading: Shipping & Orders
settings.row_content:
We aim to process orders within 1-3 working days. Each order will be processed and packed with the greatest care and hygiene.

Tracking information will be provided on all orders which is included in the shipping confirmation emails sent once the order has been shipped.

We cannot guarantee cancellations or changes of orders once they have been made due to the speed at which we process our orders. We will do our best to assist with any requests but it will not always be possible to make changes.

Aran Braxton will not be responsible for delay in shipment caused by holidays, weather conditions, custom issues and any other circumstances that is beyond our control. Once the order has been shipped, it will no longer be possible to change the delivery address therefore please ensure to input the correct delivery address at checkout.

US

Royal Mail Tracked 48 (3-5 Business Days) - £2.99

Royal Mail Tracked 24 (1-2 Business Days) - £5.99

INTERNATIONAL

All international orders are shipped via DHL or FedEx and will arrive within 2- 4 working days once dispatched.

While every effort is taken to send orders out as quickly as possible, in some instances, orders may take up to 5 working days to despatch. After despatch, you should expect an added wait time respective to your selected courier service.

settings.heading: Import Charges
settings.row_content:
Please note that the customers will always be responsible for paying any import bills they may receive

When importing items to outside of the US, this will always incur a customs inspection which we always provide the correct paperwork for. We cannot be held responsible for how long it takes your order to pass through customs.

settings.heading: Undelivered Items
settings.row_content: In the event that your order cannot be delivered, due to incorrect information or missed deliveries these orders will be returned to us at the courier services discretion. Once your order has been returned to us you will be contacted. Customers are responsible for any additional shipping charges for redelivery.

settings.heading: Discount & Credits
settings.row_content:
All credit and discount offers are applied to the value of the order, excluding delivery costs, and are subject to our Terms & Conditions. Unless specifically stated, discounts cannot be combined, or applied consecutively to the same order; this includes any promotional or site-wide events such as Black Friday. Some exclusions may apply to selected products and collections, which will be stated clearly.

Discount offers may only be applicable to specific items / collections, and cannot be extended to other product range.

Please note that any items purchased using store credit are only eligible for size exchange or further credit replenishment. This excludes shipping fees, as they must be covered with each new order. Any store credit generated is set to expire a year from the date they are issued, unless specifically stated otherwise.

Store credit and discount vouchers may only have one use per code, and cannot be replenished unless specifically stated.

Any credit used to make an order will be replenished if the items purchased are returned and not exchanged. Please note that discount codes cannot be replenished after a return is processed.

We reserve the right to cancel any order that is believed to be fraudulent / an abuse of a discount code.

Sale Items

Sale items purchased may only be eligible for exchanges or store credit unless specifically stated. This includes site-wide sales and certain promotional events, which will be stated clearly during event announcements and countdown emails.

Please be sure to read all relevant information regarding site-wide events, as we cannot be held responsible if they are skipped.

settings.heading: Refund & Returns - US Orders
settings.row_content:
We sincerely hope you are satisfied with your Aran Braxton purchase. However, if you change your mind for whatever reason or if you received a falty or incorrect item, we have created an integrated returns system for you to use. Go to https://www.aranbraxton.com/pages/returns to start your return.

Once the process is complete, you will be emailed a returns label.

Once your return is received and inspected, we will send you an email to notify you that we have received your returned item. We will also notify you of the approval or rejection of your refund.

If you are approved, then your refund will be processed, and a credit will automatically be applied to your credit card or original method of payment, within a certain amount of days.

Unless the product is faulty or incorrect, you will be responsible for paying for your own shipping costs for returning your item. Shipping costs are non-refundable. If you receive a refund, the cost of return shipping will be deducted from your refund.

Online Store Credit

Online Store credit is the quickest option if you want to order another product in exchange without waiting for a refund; select the Store Credit option when registering your return online. Once your return is received and processed at the warehouse, you will instantly receive an email with your store credit code and be able to use it on our website. Please be aware Online Store Credit can only be used on our website.

Exchanges

Currently, we only offer direct exchanges in size for the same product. If you would like to exchange your item for an entirely different product, you must first return your original item and place a new order. Depending on the option you choose during the returns process, we will issue you a store credit immediately once your items are approved or issue a refund to your original payment method. Please note that refunds can take up to 10 working days to show on your account due to varying processing times between payment providers.

Refunds

If a refund is selected, all successfully returned items will be credited to the original payment method used to purchase the items. The original shipping charges will not be refunded. Please note refunds can take up to 10 working days to show on your account due to varying processing times between payment providers. Store credit is the quickest option if you would like to order another product in exchange without having to wait for a refund.

If you have any queries or wish to discuss the returns procedure further, please do not hesitate to contact us at returns@aranbraxton.com.

ELIGIBILITY

If you change your mind for whatever reason or if your item is faulty or incorrect, you will have to let us know within 14 days of your purchase. Unfortunately we can not offer you a refund or exchange after this time period. Please make sure that you have carefully reviewed your order before finalizing your purchases

To be eligible for a return, , your item must be unused and in the same condition that you received it.

It must also:

  • Be in the original packaging;
  • All tags must still be attached to the unworn item/s;
  • Items must not contain any evidence of wear, stains or odors;

When returning a footwear to us, please ensure these are returned in the shoe box within a mailing bag. Also, Please try on the shoes on soft surfaces before they are worn generally. We will not accept shoes returned with sole markings or scratches.

If the above is not adhered to when you make the return. Aran Braxton reserves the right to return the item to you.

Footwear

When returning a footwear to us, ensure these are returned in the original shoe box within a mailing bag. Also, Please try on the shoes on soft surfaces before they are worn generally. We will not accept shoes returned with sole markings or scratches.

Non-returnable Items

Due to hygiene reasons, we are unable to accept returns for any socks. All sales on these items are final.

Late or missing refunds

Please keep an eye on the tracking for your return as this makes its way back to us. Once you see this has reached our warehouse please allow 3 working days for this to be processed (allow up to 5 working days during sale periods). Within this time you will be sent an email to confirm your refund has been processed. It can then take a further 5 working days to appear in your bank account.

If after this period you haven’t received a refund yet, first check your bank account again.

Then contact your credit card company, it may take some time before your refund is officially posted.

Next contact your bank. There is often some processing time before a refund is posted.

If you’ve done all of this and you still have not received your refund yet, please contact us at customersupport@aranbraxton.com.

Sale items

Sale items purchased may only be eligible for exchanges or store credit unless specifically stated. This includes site-wide sales and certain promotional events, which will be stated clearly during event announcements and countdown emails.
